title: Pride and diversity
brief_description: ‘Pride and Diversity’ was a program of digital storytelling workshops with multiple groups focussed on community issues and cultural diversity. In partnership with VicHealth, City of Stonington, City of Melbourne, Kensington Association, Kensington Women’s Dinner, Kensington Storytelling Festival ‘ community storytellers, Quiksound Productions- City of Monash FReeZA committee, Minus 18, Inside Out Group, Pride & Diversity group- Monash Youth & Family Services, Roleplay, Soundslike ‘ City of Stonington’s FreeZA committee, Go Girl Go, Young Mum’s program, The Club, Girls Own - YWCA
